title: WATCH: Zodwa gets sweet birthday surprise from new bae
text:
WATCH: Zodwa gets sweet birthday surprise from new bae share this

Johannesburg – Zodwa Wabantu was overjoyed on Wednesday when she shared a video of the birthday gifts her new bae, Vusi Buthelezi surprised her with.

The entertainer, who has been making headlines lately for several cosmetic procedures she had undergone, posted the clip on her Instagram account which shows her approaching her car and then finding a bunch of gifts inside as well as rose petals sprinkled on the floor.

Explaining what happened, she wrote: "The story behind the gifts. I land, go to the parking, where I left my car, Durban. Extra car key I keep at home. Vusi opened the car to surprise me. [sic]"

She captioned a separate post: "Birthday gifts from my boyfriend".

Zodwa's relationship with Vusi is one that only recently surfaced.

Before this, the star was engaged to Ntobeko Linda, but called off their wedding in July and announced their breakup thereafter.
description: Zodwa Wabantu was overjoyed when she shared a video of the birthday gifts her new bae, Vusi Buthelezi surprised her with.
